title: UTF8graphics
data:
**UTF8graphics** is an [option](/wiki/Option "Option") that displays the map, monster, and item symbols with distinct symbols from the [UTF-8](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-8 "wikipedia:UTF-8") character set. It needs a terminal that is capable of display UTF-8 characters. Most modern terminals support it by default.

UTF8graphics is available as an in-game settable option in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [NetHack 3.4.3 NAO](/wiki/Nethack.alt.org#NetHack_3.4.3_NAO "Nethack.alt.org"), and [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

## The complete symbol list

| Code point | Usage                         | Appearance | ASCII |
| ---------- | ----------------------------- | ---------- | ----- |
| U+2502     | vertical wall                 | │          | \|    |
| U+2500     | horizontal wall               | ─          | -     |
| U+250c     | top left corner               | ┌          | -     |
| U+2510     | top right corner              | ┐          | -     |
| U+2514     | bottom left corner            | └          | -     |
| U+2518     | bottom right corner           | ┘          | -     |
| U+253c     | cross wall                    | ┼          | -     |
| U+2534     | T up wall                     | ┴          | -     |
| U+252c     | T down wal                    | ┬          | -     |
| U+2524     | T left wall                   | ┤          | \|    |
| U+251c     | T right wall                  | ├          | \|    |
| U+00b7     | doorway                       | ·          | .     |
| U+2592     | horizontal open door          | ▒          | -     |
| U+2592     | vertical open door            | ▒          | \|    |
| U+2261     | iron bars                     | ≡          | #     |
| U+03a8     | tree                          | Ψ          | #     |
| U+00b7     | floor of a room               | ·          | .     |
| U+2264     | ladder up                     | ≤          | <     |
| U+2265     | ladder down                   | ≥          | >     |
| U+03a9     | altar                         | Ω          | \_    |
| U+2020     | grave                         | †          | \|    |
| U+00b6     | fountain                      | ¶          | {     |
| U+224b     | water                         | ≋          | }     |
| U+00b7     | ice                           | ·          | .     |
| U+224b     | molten lava                   | ≋          | }     |
| U+00b7     | vertical lowered drawbridge   | ·          | .     |
| U+00b7     | horizontal lowered drawbridge | ·          | .     |
| U+2248     | water                         | ≈          | }     |
| U+00a4     | web                           | ¤          | "     |
| U+2502     | vertical beam                 | │          | \|    |
| U+2500     | horizontal beam               | ─          | -     |
| U+2594     | swallow top center            | ▔          | -     |
| U+258f     | swallow middle left           | ▏          | \|    |
| U+2595     | swallow middle right          | ▕          | \|    |
| U+2581     | swallow bottom center         | ▁          | -     |
| U+2594     | explosion top center          | ▔          | -     |
| U+258f     | explosion middle left         | ▏          | \|    |
| U+2595     | explosion middle right        | ▕          | \|    |
| U+2581     | explosion bottom center       | ▁          | -     |
html:
UTF8graphics

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

UTF8graphics is an option that displays the map, monster, and item symbols with distinct symbols from the UTF-8 character set. It needs a terminal that is capable of display UTF-8 characters. Most modern terminals support it by default.

UTF8graphics is available as an in-game settable option in UnNetHack, NetHack 3.4.3 NAO, and dNetHack.

The complete symbol list

U+2514 bottom left corner └ -
U+2518 bottom right corner ┘ -

U+2534 T up wall ┴ -
U+252c T down wal ┬ -
U+2524 T left wall ┤ |
U+251c T right wall ├ |
U+00b7 doorway · .
U+2592 horizontal open door ▒ -
U+2592 vertical open door ▒ |
U+2261 iron bars ≡ #
U+03a8 tree Ψ #
U+00b7 floor of a room · .
U+2264 ladder up ≤ <
U+2265 ladder down ≥ >
U+03a9 altar Ω _
U+2020 grave † |
U+00b6 fountain ¶ {
U+224b water ≋ }
U+00b7 ice · .
U+224b molten lava ≋ }
U+00b7 vertical lowered drawbridge · .
U+00b7 horizontal lowered drawbridge · .
U+2248 water ≈ }
U+00a4 web ¤ "
U+2502 vertical beam │ |
U+2500 horizontal beam ─ -
U+2594 swallow top center ▔ -

'''UTF8graphics''' is an [[option]] that displays the map, monster, and item symbols with distinct symbols from the [[wikipedia:UTF-8|UTF-8]] character set. It needs a terminal that is capable of display UTF-8 characters. Most modern terminals support it by default.

UTF8graphics is available as an in-game settable option in [[UnNetHack]], [[Nethack.alt.org#NetHack_3.4.3_NAO|NetHack 3.4.3 NAO]], and [[dNetHack]].
